amendment.description: Amendment sought to designate $15 million in funding to be used to insulate the shelters at forward operating bases in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer funds with respect to Operation and Maintenance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 251 (Roll no. 504).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 251 (Roll no. 504).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Nadler.
